ERROR_TEMPLATE.title: PICK_A_NAME
ERROR_TEMPLATE.internalMessage: Message for server's error logging, not shown to front end. ie. 'Error inserting into the database.'
ERROR_TEMPLATE.file: This is filled in by the file that threw the error.
ERROR_TEMPLATE.route: This is filled in by the route that threw the error.
ERROR_TEMPLATE.specifics: Usually filled in by function that threw the error. Specific information about the error. ie. 'Inserting personal information.'
ERROR_TEMPLATE.userId: The perpetrator of the error. Filled in by function that threw error.
ERROR_TEMPLATE.status: Usually an integer, HTTP status code.

response.message: Message for the user, be generic and don't expose too much of the inner working of the server.
steps: Steps users can do to solve problem. eg.
Repeat the action that caused the error.
